214-The following commands are recognized:
   ABOR   ADAT   ALLO   APPE   AUTH   CDUP   CLNT   CWD 
   DELE   EPRT   EPSV   FEAT   HASH   HELP   LIST   MDTM
   MFMT   MKD    MLSD   MLST   MODE   NLST   NOOP   NOP 
   OPTS   P@SW   PASS   PASV   PBSZ   PORT   PROT   PWD 
   QUIT   REST   RETR   RMD    RNFR   RNTO   SITE   SIZE
   STOR   STRU   SYST   TYPE   USER   XCUP   XCWD   XMKD
   XPWD   XRMD
214 Have a nice day.

 MDTM
 REST STREAM

 MLST type*;size*;modify*;
 MLSD
 UTF8
 CLNT
 MFMT

 EPRT

  1. Stay Connected

    Find out what's happening

  1. MASSANETTA SPRINGS ROAD IMPROVEMENT PROJECT DETOUR ROUTE - PUBLIC NOTICE

    Starting February 18th the Massanetta Springs Road improvement project will officially begin. Read on for additional information and map of route closure details. Additional Info...

  2. Household Hazardous Waste Collection Day on April 20, 2019

    City of Harrisonburg & Rockingham County Residents Hazardous Waste Collection Day to be held Saturday, April 20, 2019 from 8:00 AM to 12:00 noon. Additional Info...

  3. Rockingham County – Today and Tomorrow

    “Rockingham County – Today and Tomorrow,” a current picture and projections to aid the Board in its consideration of land use proposals and as input for the upcoming updates to the Comprehensive Plan. Read on...
